p.s: Algicola (Al.gi.co′la. L. n. alga -ae a seaweed; L. suff. -cola from L. n. incola an inhabitant, dweller; N.L. fem. n. Algicola inhabitant of algae).
Motile by means of a single flagellum.
Requires sea water or addition of marine salts and organic factors for growth.
The genus is affiliated to the ‘Gammaproteobacteria’ and contains one species, Algicola bacteriolytica, which is the type species.
